summary:
Starbucks began as a coffee bean store in Seattle in 1971. Howard Schultz took over and turned it into a popular coffee shop, expanding it across the U.S. Now, it's a global giant with over 35,000 stores in 80 countries.

Starbucks offers a range of drinks, teas, and snacks. It's known for its cozy atmosphere and free Wi-Fi. The company has faced some criticism but remains one of the world's most popular and valuable coffee chains.
title: Starbucks
